issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: MiniDFSCluster doesnot support Multiple instances of HTTPS servers. Because it will not use the ephemeral port for HTTPS addresses of NameNode and DataNode. So second instance will get PortAlreadyInUse exception.
fields.summary: MiniDFSCluster doesnt support multiple HTTPS server instances

comments.body: Attaching the patch for the same. Please review.
